meanings.definition: A ruler who has power and control over a territory or group of people.
meanings.sent1: The overlord of the kingdom made all the important decisions.
meanings.sent2: The overlord's subjects obeyed his every command.
meanings.sent3: The overlord decided to ban all desserts in the kingdom, causing an uproar among the citizens.
meanings.sent4: The overlord's influence stretched far and wide, like a giant shadow over the land.
meanings.sent5: The overlord's iron fist rule was feared by all who lived under his reign.

meanings.definition: A person who holds power or authority over others, often in a harsh or oppressive manner.
meanings.sent1: The corporate overlord demanded long hours from his employees without fair compensation.
meanings.sent2: The overlord's tyranny knew no bounds as he crushed any opposition.
meanings.sent3: The overlord insisted on everyone wearing silly hats to work, much to the amusement of the staff.
meanings.sent4: The overlord's gaze was like a piercing sword, striking fear into the hearts of those beneath him.
meanings.sent5: The overlord's oppressive rule cast a dark cloud over the entire organization.
